body:
### Welcome to Iivari

Iivari is a digital signage system. 


### Client

Custom Qt WebKit application.
See the [installation instructions in the wiki](/lamikae/iivari/wiki/Client-installation-instructions)


### Server

Provides slide management interface for organisations.
See the [installation instructions in the wiki](/lamikae/iivari/wiki/Server-installation-instructions)


### Iivari Express

Simple slideshow generator for iivari-client.
See the [installation instructions in the wiki](/lamikae/iivari/wiki/Iivari-express)
name: Iivari
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
